refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the index of the specified color

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
intimagecolorexact resourceimage intred intgreen intblue
Returns the index of the specified color in the palette of the image.
If you created the image from a file, only colors used in the image are resolved. Colors present only in the palette are not resolved.

&reftitle.parameters;
&gd.image.description;
red
Value of red component.
green
Value of green component.
blue
Value of blue component.
